```{=html}
<div class="countdown-container">
  <div class="countdown-title">Days Until the Ball</div>
  <div class="countdown-number" id="countdown">â€”</div>
</div>

<script>
  function updateCountdown() {
    const eventDate = new Date('2026-02-27T00:00:00').getTime();
    const today = new Date().getTime();
    const daysRemaining = Math.ceil((eventDate - today) / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
    const maxDays = 60; // Starting point for blue color
    
    document.getElementById('countdown').textContent = Math.max(0, daysRemaining);
    
    // Calculate color transition from blue to red based on days remaining
    let color1, color2;
    
    if (daysRemaining > maxDays) {
      // All blue
      color1 = '#667eea';
      color2 = '#764ba2';
    } else if (daysRemaining < 0) {
      // All red
      color1 = '#f093fb';
      color2 = '#f5576c';
    } else {
      // Transition from blue to red
      const ratio = 1 - (daysRemaining / 19);
      
      // Blue: #667eea â†’ Red: #f093fb
      const r1 = Math.round(102 + (240 - 102) * ratio);
      const g1 = Math.round(126 + (147 - 126) * ratio);
      const b1 = Math.round(234 + (251 - 234) * ratio);
      color1 = `rgb(${r1}, ${g1}, ${b1})`;
      
      // Blue: #764ba2 â†’ Red: #f5576c
      const r2 = Math.round(118 + (245 - 118) * ratio);
      const g2 = Math.round(75 + (87 - 75) * ratio);
      const b2 = Math.round(162 + (108 - 162) * ratio);
      color2 = `rgb(${r2}, ${g2}, ${b2})`;
    }
    
    const countdownElement = document.querySelector('.countdown-container');
    countdownElement.style.background = `linear-gradient(135deg, ${color1} 0%, ${color2} 100%)`;
  }
  
  updateCountdown();
</script>

<div class="gallery-container">
  <div class="gallery-wrapper">
    <img class="gallery-image" src="images/2019-oist-grad-ball_01.jpg" alt="2019 Graduation Ball - Photo 1">
    <img class="gallery-image" src="images/2019-oist-grad-ball_02.jpg" alt="2019 Graduation Ball - Photo 2">
    <img class="gallery-image" src="images/2019-oist-grad-ball_03.jpg" alt="2019 Graduation Ball - Photo 3">
    <img class="gallery-image" src="images/2019-oist-grad-ball_05.jpg" alt="2019 Graduation Ball - Photo 4">
    <img class="gallery-image" src="images/2019-oist-grad-ball_06.jpg" alt="2019 Graduation Ball - Photo 5">
</div>
  <button class="gallery-nav gallery-prev" onclick="changeGalleryImage(-1)">â®</button>
  <button class="gallery-nav gallery-next" onclick="changeGalleryImage(1)">â¯</button>
  <div class="gallery-dots">
    <span class="dot active" onclick="currentGalleryImage(0)"></span>
    <span class="dot" onclick="currentGalleryImage(1)"></span>
    <span class="dot" onclick="currentGalleryImage(2)"></span>
    <span class="dot" onclick="currentGalleryImage(3)"></span>
    <span class="dot" onclick="currentGalleryImage(4)"></span>
  </div>
</div>

<script>
let galleryIndex = 0;
let galleryTimer;

function changeGalleryImage(n) {
  clearTimeout(galleryTimer);
  galleryIndex += n;
  if (galleryIndex >= document.querySelectorAll('.gallery-image').length) {
    galleryIndex = 0;
  }
  if (galleryIndex < 0) {
    galleryIndex = document.querySelectorAll('.gallery-image').length - 1;
  }
  displayGalleryImage();
  autoGallery();
}

function currentGalleryImage(n) {
  clearTimeout(galleryTimer);
  galleryIndex = n;
  displayGalleryImage();
  autoGallery();
}

function displayGalleryImage() {
  const images = document.querySelectorAll('.gallery-image');
  const dots = document.querySelectorAll('.dot');
  
  images.forEach(img => img.style.display = 'none');
  images[galleryIndex].style.display = 'block';
  
  dots.forEach(dot => dot.classList.remove('active'));
  dots[galleryIndex].classList.add('active');
}

function autoGallery() {
  galleryTimer = setTimeout(() => {
    galleryIndex++;
    if (galleryIndex >= document.querySelectorAll('.gallery-image').length) {
      galleryIndex = 0;
    }
    displayGalleryImage();
    autoGallery();
  }, 4000);
}

// Initialize gallery
displayGalleryImage();
autoGallery();
</script>
```
